levels.description: Deals <@ba.vup>{sword_begin_atk_scale:0%}</> of ATK as Arts damage to ground enemies ahead, attack range <@ba.vup>changes</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, ground enemies within attack range are <$ba.sluggish>slowed</>; when skill expires, deals <@ba.vup>{sword_end_atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to ground enemies in range.
